definition: to employ/to recruit (talented personnel)/to gather together (a team)
to send/to devote/to deliver/to cause/to convey

sentences.english: Lessons must remain learned from the past wars.
sentences.chinese: 必需從過往的戰爭中羅致履歷哺育。

sentences.english: The warrior is able to draw strength from the benevolent spirits of the Fade.
sentences.chinese: 戰士能夠大黑甜鄉中的友善魂靈上羅致力量。

sentences.english: If you fail; donat forget to learn your lesson.
sentences.chinese: 借使你失敗了，千萬別忘了羅致訓導。

sentences.english: It cannot be utilized which will haudio-videoe grelocated at influence for the environment.
sentences.chinese: 它不能被羅致這將對環境變成很大的影響。

sentences.english: Palin paid tribute to Ferraro on her Internet Facebook page on Saturday.
sentences.chinese: 佩林星期六晚在自己的臉書網頁上向費拉羅致敬。
